security: Releasing this information could reveal investigative techniques and sources used by INSCOM/CSF, as well as potentially expose the identity of individuals providing information to the agency. For example, the report details a 'physical check' conducted at a specific address and the questioning of a building superintendent, Mrs. Matos.
summary: This document is an agent report detailing an unsuccessful attempt to locate and interview Aleanso Ortiz, a listed character reference for Manuel Marti. The physical check was conducted at 810 Hunts Point Avenue, Bronx, New York, but yielded no information regarding Ortiz or Marti.
summary_one_paragraph: On November 21, 1968, INSCOM/CSF submitted an agent report detailing the investigation into Manuel Marti. As part of this investigation, a physical check was conducted on November 3, 1968, at 810 Hunts Point Avenue, Bronx, New York, to locate and interview Aleanso Ortiz, a listed character reference for Marti. The investigation revealed no listing for Ortiz at the address, and the building superintendent, Mrs. Matos, stated she had never heard of Marti.
title: [RESTRICTED]
